resources.string: Not Recording: you are stopped or at a known location
Recording in the background. Tap for more info
You seem to have stopped. Have you reached a destination?
This is an ongoing study. For the duration of your participation (a maximum of two weeks), please leave Itinerum™ running in the background. You can use your phone as usual.

While we have made our best efforts to minimize power consumption, Itinerum™ will still decrease the battery life of your phone because it uses location services. It may be necessary to charge your phone if you spend a lot of time travelling on a given day.
Location services are required for this app to record your location. Please click below to allow this app permission to use location services.
You will not be able to record points and participate in the survey without enabling this permission.
Location not found. Try zooming out.
Location not found. Please check your connection
Google Play services: unable to resolve connection error.
Received an unknown activity request code %1$d in onActivityResult.
No GPS provider available. Please check your location settings and enable a location provider.
Itinerum™ is an application developed as part of a research project between Concordia University and the survey administrator. Its use is governed by Concordia University’s ethics guidelines.

You are invited to closely read the following information before deciding whether or not to participate in a transportation study conducted on the Itinerum™ platform. Take as much time as you need and consult other people if necessary.


A. PURPOSE 

The purpose of this research project is to collect and analyze travel behaviour data with smart phones and similar devices. The survey administrator and researchers at Concordia University will use travel behavioural data (origin and destination of trips, number of trips, transportation modes, etc.) to better understand behaviour. Reports showing anonymous, aggregate data will be used in conferences, publications or on the Internet.


B. PROCEDURES 

• Participation in this survey will be done through my iOS/Android phone by using an app. 

• I will be asked a few questions regarding socio-demographic information about me and my household. 

• The duration of the survey will vary but you can cancel your participation at any time. 

• During my participation in the survey, locational information will be collected automatically and then transmitted and recorded securely on servers hosted in Canada and administered by Professor Zachary Patterson of Concordia University. 

• Should the survey administrator offer a draw for prizes, the terms of this draw will be spelled out within the survey information page of the app. 

• Raw data collected as part of this survey will only be used in line with the purpose of this project. Raw data will only be available to researchers of the survey administrator and in Zachary Patterson’s TRIP Laboratory, subject to the Act respecting Access to documents held by public bodies and the Protection of personal information (chapter A-2.1) in the Province of Québec, Canada. 

• The privacy of data collected will be respected and the information that could reveal the identity of participants, directly or indirectly, will not be disseminated.


C. RISKS 

Participation in this survey represents no known or foreseeable risk to me.


D. BENEFITS 

Transportation behavioural data (trips origins and destinations, number of trips, transport modes, etc.) will allow the estimation of transportation demand and planning of the transportation system, representing thus a possible benefit to society.


In addition, the survey administrator may offer participants a draw for prizes. Please verify the survey information page in the app for further details.


E. CONDITIONS OF PARTICIPATION 

I understand that I must be 18 years of age or older to participate in this study. 

I understand that my participation is entirely voluntary and that I am free to withdraw my consent and discontinue my participation at any time (by deleting the Itinerum™ app) without negative consequences. 

I understand that should I withdraw from the study, any data collected up until my withdrawal will remain as part of the survey database with the survey administrator and Concordia University. 

I understand that my participation in this study is anonymous (i.e., researchers will not know my identity) 

I understand that the results from analysis of this data may be published, but will not be presented in such a way that my identity could be revealed.


F. DECLARATION OF CONSENT


I ACCEPT THESE CONDITIONS (mandatory to participate in the study)


If at any time you have questions or comments about the proposed research or this study, please send an email to: itinerum@concordia.ca

By pressing the button below, I confirm that I have attentively read and understood the above consent and the information presented, and I attest to the fact that my consent is informed, that all of my questions have been answered to my satisfaction and that I have had sufficient time to decide whether I want to participate in this study. I freely and voluntarily consent to participate in this study.
Thank you for downloading Itinerum™. Your participation is appreciated.
To help our research, please answer the following survey.
Please indicate the location of your %s.
How do you typically commute to your %s?
Do you use any alternative mode of travel to your %s?
Do you have a driver’s licence and/or monthly transit pass?
How many people live in your home?
How many cars are at your home?
Why did you make this trip?
How did you make this trip?
Survey complete. Thank you for using Itinerum™! You may now uninstall the app
Connection Error. Please check your phone settings.
Location mode must be set to High Accuracy for recording to work properly. Please enable and leave on High Accuracy for the duration of this survey.

Itinerum™ is an ongoing study. The app will collect your location data for up to the amount of time parametrized by your survey administrator (click on the survey administrator icon on the map screen for more information) if you keep the app running. The purpose of this app is to test and develop methods of better understanding travel behavior through the use of smartphones. Your participation will allow us to develop methods to overtly collect and analyze smartphone data to be used to improve transportation planning techniques.
Congratulations! You have validated %d trips. You will no longer be prompted to validate trips and can participate for up to %d days. If you no longer wish to participate, you can uninstall the app.
Would you like to pause the recording of locations?
Would you like to start the recording of locations?
Please input the survey code you received below
Unable to join survey for unknown reason. Please try again.
Unsaved new prompt will be discarded
Unsaved prompt changes will be discarded
By changing surveys, all of the data from the current survey on your phone will be deleted. Are you sure you want to continue?
Unable to sync your survey - Please try again
Are you sure? You cannot participate if you do not accept these terms
Manually sync data to backend. Last sync:
Leave the current survey and wipe data from device
Stop all location recording indefinitely. No trips will be recorded while paused.
Report bugs, issues, enhancements, or suggestions
